title: Anyone up for a research project?
author: VD
content_html: I would like to know precisely how many car chases, missing children stories and murder trials the Fox News Channel has covered since 1996. I’m not a Fox junkie, so I’m not really up on this, but if anyone happens to know, let me know. Thanks.
content_text: I would like to know precisely how many car chases, missing children stories and murder trials the Fox News Channel has covered since 1996.  I’m not a Fox junkie, so I’m not really up on this, but if anyone happens to know, let me know.  Thanks.
